name: Attract Steve
description:
Game made in 48h for the ScoreJam 18 (3rd day not used, as we had to work like responsible adults)

The game
Simple infinite runner, move left/right (either clicking or using the arrow keys)
* pick coins for score
* speed boosts also count as multipliers
* magnetic objects stick to your body
* dodge obstacles, hitting an obstacle removes either a magnetic object or ends the run
* portals remove all your objects but turn you into another cool character, giving you style points

The concept behind
The idea was to make a submission without using other tools than unity, which meant using 3rd party assets (mainly obtained through humble bundles, plus some packs we had brought in the past).

Used resources include:
* Ultimate lowpoly pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733
*  Synty fx pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/polygon-particle-fx-low-poly..
*Animation pack https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/everyday-motion-pack-116611
* icons from https://game-icons.net
* Scores via LootLocker (we used the web browser to configure it)
